attributes.action: recommend John Ryan Chairman of Doncaster rovers be knighted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For services to football and business. Not only is John Ryan a successful business man he has also helped take Doncaster rovers to highest league place in 50 years. Saving a club on the brink of going out of existance.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
